data.message: Or you could just put him on a track with you instead of asking ppl to help him win some contest nobody will remember 6 months from now 🐸☕️

replies.message:
The boy is trying to make it for himself and rightly so.
 Yes he could put him on the label from the start. How many would then say he is riding Eminems coat tails?
 Going at it alone for a while gives him better cred and let's him do it on his own terms.
But he's not even doing it on his own. Eminem is asking his fans to go vote and he has hundreds of millions of fans. The other artists in the contest don't have that luxury.
Tony McCallum he's already riding his father's coat tails so what's it matter if he rides eminem's too?
